PackageOracle.name: DA_ACCOUNT_CREDIT_RATING
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_CREDIT_RATING
/* Generated on 18-JUL-15 03.35.04.229282000 AM -05:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,credit_rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,credit_rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,credit_rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_account_credit_rating;

body.name: DA_ACCOUNT_CREDIT_RATING
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_CREDIT_RATING
/* Generated on 18-JUL-15 03.35.04.475323000 AM -05:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,credit_rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_credit_rating.add(fx), parms=' || credit_rating_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || effective_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_credit_rating a
(
a.account_id
,a.credit_rating_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.effective_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_account_id.NEXTVAL
,add.credit_rating_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.effective_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.account_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_credit_rating.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,credit_rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_credit_rating.add, parms=' || credit_rating_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || effective_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_credit_rating a
(
a.account_id
,a.credit_rating_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.effective_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_account_id.NEXTVAL
,add.credit_rating_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.effective_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_credit_rating.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,credit_rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_credit_rating.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || credit_rating_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || effective_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_credit_rating a
(
a.account_id
,a.credit_rating_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.effective_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_id
,add.credit_rating_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.effective_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_credit_rating.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_credit_rating.del, parms=' || account_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_account_credit_rating a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.account_id = del.account_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_credit_rating.del');

END del;

END da_account_credit_rating;
